# API Reference - Complete Source Code Documentation

This section provides **complete source code documentation** for all Python modules in the DIP_SMC_PSO project.

## Overview

Every Python file in the project is documented here with:
- ✅ **Full source code** embedded with syntax highlighting
- ✅ **Extracted docstrings** for modules, classes, and functions
- ✅ **Architecture information** and module relationships
- ✅ **Line-by-line explanations** for key algorithms
- ✅ **Usage examples** and tutorials

## Modules

```{toctree}
:maxdepth: 2
:caption: Modules

__init__.py/index
analysis/index
benchmarks/index
config/index
configuration/index
controllers/index
core/index
fault_detection/index
integration/index
interfaces/index
optimization/index
optimizer/index
plant/index
simulation/index
utils/index
```

## Module Descriptions

### [__init__.py](__init__.py/index)

Module documentation

### [analysis](analysis/index)

Performance analysis, validation, fault detection, and visualization

### [benchmarks](benchmarks/index)

Integration benchmarking and statistical testing

### [config](config/index)

Configuration management and validation

### [configuration](configuration/index)

Module documentation

### [controllers](controllers/index)

Sliding mode controllers and factory patterns

### [core](core/index)

Core simulation engine and dynamics models

### [fault_detection](fault_detection/index)

Fault detection and isolation (FDI) systems

### [integration](integration/index)

Numerical integration methods

### [interfaces](interfaces/index)

Protocol definitions and type annotations

### [optimization](optimization/index)

PSO optimization and parameter tuning

### [optimizer](optimizer/index)

Legacy PSO optimizer (deprecated)

### [plant](plant/index)

Physical plant models and configurations

### [simulation](simulation/index)

Simulation runners and batch processing

### [utils](utils/index)

Utility functions for validation, monitoring, and development
